entry.title: Privilege Escalation via adbd Misconfiguration
entry.content:
I’ve released an advisory which details and demonstrates a vulnerability that exists in Android’s ‘ADB over Wifi’ feature. This vulnerability when exploited would allow any android application to elevate its privileges from the context of “u:r:untrusted_app:s0” to that of “u:r:shell:s0”.

This vulnerability currently affects Android 4.2.2 to 8.0. The patch for which was included in the January 5, 2018 Android Security Bulletin. Android users are advised to update their devices to this patch level.

The advisory is hosted at MWR Labs

entry.title: Screen Capture via UI Overlays
entry.content:
I’ve published my advisory on a vulnerability in Android’s MediaProjection service that when exploited would allow any android application to trick users into recording the contents of their screen.

This vulnerability currently affects Android 5.0 to 7.1.2. Android users are advised to upgrade to Android 8.0 which patches this vulnerability.

The advisory is hosted at MWR Labs
